node.text:
Gabriel Lyrio (creator of Light is Consciousness & co-creator of Fractal Science) and the polymath Robert Edward Grant @robertedwardgrant

This was my first appearance in my page (02/02/2020).

I am a researcher of philosophy, physics, cosmology, hermeticism, sacred geometry, alchemy, etc... On the other hand, the person who I am interviewing is one of the brightest minds I have ever seen, so I am honored to have this opportunity to work with him and to present his works to you!

Robert Edward Grant is an accomplished sculptor, artist, and musician. He additionally holds several patents and various intellectual property in the fields of DNA and phenotypic expression, human cybernetic implantology, biophotonics, and electromagnetism. He has multiple publications in unified mathematics and physics related to his discoveries of quasi-prime numbers (a new classification for prime numbers), the world’s first predictive algorithm determining infinite prime numbers, and a unification wave-based theory connecting and correlating fundamental mathematical constants such as Pi, Euler, Alpha, Gamma and Phi. 

Robert E. Grant is the Founder, Chairman, and Managing Partner of Strathspey Crown LLC, a growth equity holding company based in Newport Beach, CA with a broad portfolio of company and asset holdings spanning healthcare, clean energy, social media, and financial technology.

In addition, he is the Founder, Chairman and CEO of CONCIERGE KEY Health, the first on-demand service to the world's elite physician specialists. He is also the Founder and Vice Chairman of ALPHAEON Corporation (a subsidiary of Strathspey Crown Holdings LLC), a leader in the rapidly growing field of Lifestyle Healthcare and based in Irvine, CA. He served as the founding CEO of CONCIERGE KEY Health from April, 2017 until July, 2018. Likewise, he served as the founding CEO of ALPHAEON Corporation from February, 2013 until August 2016. 

He was formerly CEO and President of Bausch and Lomb Surgical in June of 2010. Prior to this, he led Allergan Medical as President from 2006 to 2010.

Watch the Full 1h Video on YouTube in our new channel!

#GabrielLyrio #RobertEdwardGrant #LIVE #LightIsConsciousness

node.text:
Robert Edward Grant (@robertedwardgrant) is sharing what makes beautiful mind: any moment free from fear is an opportunity to taste immortality and new possibilities.

With over 2.5 million views on YouTube.

In the spirit of ideas worth spreading, TEDx is a program of local, self-organized events that bring people together to share a TED-like experience. At a TEDx event, TEDTalks video and live speakers combine to spark deep discussion and connection in a small group.
ㅤ
#BeautifulMinds #Gratitude #Fear #BeautifulMindsAreFreeFromFear
#TEDTalk #TEDx #Inspirational #RobertEdwardGrant #FreeFromFear

node.text:
"The top view of a magnetic field under a magnetic film (Ferrocell) reveals a 2D Toroidal geometry (orthogonal perspective) of a 3D Torus.

When viewed in 3D, it reveals a complete Torus.  Electromagnetic fields are toroidal in nature.  Within the electromagnetic field we can extract the regular 2D symbol / pattern from the closest sphere packing known as "Flower of Life".

The arrangement of metal spheres between two magnetic fields forms polygonal structures analogous to molecular and atomic geometry, presenting triangular, square, pentagonal, hexagonal symmetry, etc., until forming an omnitriangulated grid of regular two-dimensional packing of spheres (Flower of Life), and  Vector Equilibrium (Cuboctahedron), when 19 metal spheres are introduced.  By superimposing an image of the carbon molecule (nanographene) on the pattern formed by the magnetic arrangement of the metallic spheres (Flower of Life), we can see that it fits perfectly.

Carbon is the molecule of life.

This electromagnetic molecular bonding process does not only form carbon, but all molecules of matter.

The electromagnetic force is responsible for most of the interactions we see in our environment, as it keeps electrons in orbit around the atomic nucleus and allows molecular bonds to form visible matter.

When you draw the "Seed of Life" symbol (6-petal rosette) and multiply its circles in rotation, you can get the exact Toroidal Knot from the perspective above a magnetic pole." - Gabriel Lyrio
---
Top left video: Scene from the documentary "Primer Fields" by David LaPoint.
---
Top right video: "Brief demonstration of a square bar magnet under Ferrocell shows the same field of stacked magnets as seen in previous videos."  Brian Kerr video
---
Bottom left video "Hertz Donuts" by digitalrefuge
---
Bottom right video: 1/2 x 1/2 x 1 48 g neodymium magnet surrounded by 6 ferrocells located in a double ferrocell.

#fractalscience #physics #science #primerfields #davidlapoint #magnetism #strongforce #sacredgeometry #torus #chemistry #geometry #math #form #geometryofmagnetism #symmetry #electromagnetism #polygons #symmetry #fundamentalforces #mathconstants #finestructureconstant #selfassembly

Thoughts?

node.text:
By @robertedwardgrant Some time ago, I posted a picture of a Hexagonal Spiral as the precise  basis for the Whirlpool Galaxy, I further posited that all galaxies would eventually be found to conform precisely to simple polygonal spirals.  I believed that the right triangle IS the foundational basis of all spirals, which spiral pitch is defined by the Hypotenuse/Height of inherent right triangles found within all polygons.  I asked one of our summer interns @amanda.e.kennedy (UCF Aerospace Engineering Candidate) to research this thesis further with the intention of publishing a seminal Astrophysics paper proving this self-evident (Universal) relationship.  The underlying nature of mathematical Spirality has been the subject of much academic research over several years.  Normally broad adjustments are required to "titrate" the Natural Logarithm (Euler #) to explain why certain Galaxies possess certain Spirality and Pitch (characteristics), many theories related to speed of rotation and angular momentum have even been posited in the literature but none have demonstrated more than a corollary incidence and NONE has put forth a geometric proof demonstrating a determinable relationship.  Today was our first review of this groundbreaking internal research on Polygonal Geometries and their relationship (determinant correlation/ and even potentially demonstrating causality) to Galactic Spiral and Pitch......compared to the current academic research on this topic, this explanation is far more simple than the highly complex and barely comprehensible papers put forward as explanations for this natural phenomenon.  So far we have not found a single Galaxy that doesn't perfectly match a simple polygonal spiral, pointing to a much larger correlation to Gravity and the right triangular nature of spacetime itself.....(geometric) Scalar Waves (gravity) determining Transverse Waves (electromagnetism) and vice versa.  Lots of excitement around our Math and Physics Research activities at our offices lately.....

#physicss #galaxy #geometry #mathematics #space #time #light #gravity #astronomy #electromagnetism #math #ratio #form #proportion #cosmos #cosmology #cycle

node.text:
The Eye of Horus was an ancient Egyptian mystery school which taught the occult science of the "Flower of Life", a universal blueprint of creation which leaves it's signature in all creation.

The Flower of Life encodes the language of the light of consciousness which generates all motion, forms, patterns, life and the universe.

Everything is light, and the Flower of Life is the eternal geometric matrix which composes all laws of physics and the harmonics of all manifestation.

This science explains that geometry is co-eternal with the Mind of God — the Light of Consciousness.

From this science, the pythagoreans, platonists and alchemists of the past understood the relationship between energy, frequency, form, animation, life and the entire cosmos.

The concept of "cosmos" explained by Pythagoras, which is the intrinsict subjacent order of the universe, is born from the cosmology of the Flower of Life, that explains how the light of consciousness is the one and only substance which is creating, transforming and evolving all matter and life in the universe.

Music by Ben Joseph Stewart. (Kymatica)

Excerpt from "El Ojo de Horus" (The Eye of Horus) documentary by egyptologist and mathematician R.A.Schwaller de Lubicz, dubbed in english by Gabriel Lyrio.

#TheFlowerOfLife #SacredGeometry #Egypt #EgyptianMisterySchools #TheEyeOfHorus #LightIsConsciousness #Cosmology #Form #Geometry #Physics #Consciousness #Symbolism #Universal #Knowledge

node.text:
The Flower of Life symbol can be found at Abydos, Egypt.
ㅤ
The scientist priests of the ancient egyptian mystery schools of the "Eye of Horus" used this geometric form to explain how all creation is formed by One Law.
ㅤ
The Pyramids holds the Secret of the Flower of Life: An eternally reccurring pattern which dictates all forms and cycles within the Universe.
ㅤ
This pattern reveals a universal language of light, which shapes all manifest reality from micro to macro.
ㅤ
#FlowerOfLife #Pyramids #369 #Osirion #Temple #Egypt #Giza #UniversalLanguage #Geometry #Light #TheFractalUniverse #LIGHTISCONSCIOUSNESS

node.text:
Scene from "Inner Worlds, Outer Worlds" documentary by Dan Schmidt.

Impermanence, called anicca (Pāli) or anitya (Sanskrit), appears extensively in the Pali Canon as one of the essential doctrines of Buddhism.The doctrine asserts that all of conditioned existence, without exception, is "transient, evanescent, inconstant". All temporal things, whether material or mental, are compounded objects in a continuous change of condition, subject to decline and destruction. All physical and mental events are not constant or permanent; they come into being and dissolve.

Human life embodies this flux in the aging process, the cycle of repeated birth and death (Samsara), nothing lasts, everything decays and changes. 

This is in contrast to nirvana, the reality that is nicca, or knows no change, decay or death.

#buddhism #anicca #nicca #nirvana #mind #consciousness #cosmology #unity #monad

node.text:
By @lanceschuttler “As far as we can tell, each brain center generates impulses at a specific frequency based on the predominant neurotransmitter it secretes. In other words, the brain’s internal communication system—its language, is based on frequency… Presumably, when we send in waves of electrical energy at, say, 10 Hz, certain cells in the lower brain stem will respond because they normally fire within that frequency range.”

This is also exactly what Dr. Candice Pert has proved, who was a neuroscientist, biophysicist and pharmacologist, who researched at the National Institute of Health (NIH) and taught at the Georgetown University School of Medicine. Dr. Pert was the first to prove that thoughts and emotions create a direct physiological effect on the body, thus demonstrating the long held beliefs of Mind-Body medicine.

In other words, she proved that positive or negative thoughts and emotions are always either improving or declining our health, based on the chemicals that are released and transported to every cell. Dr. Pert had this to say about the effects of frequency in affecting the cells of body:

“Energy and vibration go all the way to the molecular level. We have 70 different receptors on the molecules and when vibration and frequency reaches that far they begin to vibrate [thus allowing the cells to be directly affected by vibration].…

Basically, receptors function as scanners. They cluster in cellular membranes, waiting for the right ligand (much smaller molecules than receptors), to come dancing along (diffusing) through the fluid surrounding each cell, and mount them – binding with them and (vibrating) them to turn them on and get them motivated to vibrate a message into the cell. Binding of the ligand to the receptor is likened to two voices, striking the same note and producing a vibration that rings a doorbell to open the doorway to the cell.”

To know more about psycho-acoustic medicine read the complete article in the link in the description of Lance Schuttler. 

#lanceschuttler #psychoacoustic #medicine #brainwaves #vibration #health #science #frequency #brain #balance #mind #emotions #psyche #physiology #neurophysiology

node.text:
Post by @lanceschuttler "In response to these challenges, our organization presents solutions through the holistic application of science and technology; two areas in which recent advancements hold the potential to make far-reaching positive impacts. However, while technology may succeed in gradually alleviating some of these problems, they cannot be resolved by simply addressing symptoms, as we do now, because they are byproducts of a much larger problem. Another major issue is that business interests currently require short-term planning and timely returns on investments. For these reasons, in addition to our expanded technical approach, our proposals include an alternative economic model which overcomes these artificial barriers to planetary wellbeing.

Our methodologies are designed to realize the full potential of science and technology to achieve social betterment for all living systems. We advocate new ways of thinking and living to enable human beings, technology, and nature to progress sustainably.” — The Venus Project

Read the full article are Lance Schuttler's site in the link in his bio.

node.text:
Gabriel Lyrio (creator of Light is Consciousness & co-creator of Fractal Science) and the polymath Robert Edward Grant @robertedwardgrant

This was my first appearance in my page (02/02/2020).

I am a researcher of philosophy, physics, cosmology, hermeticism, sacred geometry, alchemy, etc... On the other hand, the person who I am interviewing is one of the brightest minds I have ever seen, so I am honored to have this opportunity to work with him and to present his works to you!

Robert Edward Grant is an accomplished sculptor, artist, and musician. He additionally holds several patents and various intellectual property in the fields of DNA and phenotypic expression, human cybernetic implantology, biophotonics, and electromagnetism. He has multiple publications in unified mathematics and physics related to his discoveries of quasi-prime numbers (a new classification for prime numbers), the world’s first predictive algorithm determining infinite prime numbers, and a unification wave-based theory connecting and correlating fundamental mathematical constants such as Pi, Euler, Alpha, Gamma and Phi. 

Robert E. Grant is the Founder, Chairman, and Managing Partner of Strathspey Crown LLC, a growth equity holding company based in Newport Beach, CA with a broad portfolio of company and asset holdings spanning healthcare, clean energy, social media, and financial technology.

In addition, he is the Founder, Chairman and CEO of CONCIERGE KEY Health, the first on-demand service to the world's elite physician specialists. He is also the Founder and Vice Chairman of ALPHAEON Corporation (a subsidiary of Strathspey Crown Holdings LLC), a leader in the rapidly growing field of Lifestyle Healthcare and based in Irvine, CA. He served as the founding CEO of CONCIERGE KEY Health from April, 2017 until July, 2018. Likewise, he served as the founding CEO of ALPHAEON Corporation from February, 2013 until August 2016. 

He was formerly CEO and President of Bausch and Lomb Surgical in June of 2010. Prior to this, he led Allergan Medical as President from 2006 to 2010.

Watch the Full 1h Video on YouTube in our new channel!

#GabrielLyrio #RobertEdwardGrant #LIVE #LightIsConsciousness

May be an image of text that says 'HOLOFRACTOGRAPHIC UNIVERSE Venus Pentagram DNA Cross Section Cymatic Pentagram @LIGHTISCONSCIOUSNESS All symmetries we see in nature are shaped by fundamental forces of physics. All dynamics and structures in the universe are ruled by general laws of motion and spatial geometry.'.

node.text:
Geometry exists in all scales of the nature, from microscopic scales such as molecules, to astronomical scales such as in the patterns of orbital resonance of celestial bodies and galaxies.

The geometry formed in the universe is due to the laws of spatial geometry and motion which rules how the fundamental forces of electromagnetism, gravity, strong and weak nuclear forces works.

Modern physics points to the idea that everything in the universe can be explained by the interaction of the fundamental forces, and that all of them without exception are ruled by laws of geometry and motion.

The laws of vibratory motion forms geometric patterns through the resonance and synchronized interaction of wave interference.

Physics proves all geometry in reality, from symmetries to asymmetries, can be reduced to the phenomena of energy, frequency, vibration. 

Energy of what? All fundamental forces, gravity, strong and weak nuclear forces merges with electromagnetism, which is light.

Light can be converted into cycles, motions, animations, vibrations, into magnetism and electricity, into energy such as heat or cold, into matter such as particles and molecules, into life and consciousness, into intelligence and ultimately guides and forms all cycles of evolution in the known universe. 

This infinite mandala-creating universe is a holographic and electromagnetic fractal substance formed by geometric laws of light.

Art by my artist friend João Junqueira. I imagined the concept of an art that could symbolize the symmetric relationship between toroidal dynamics, harmonic motions, orbitals, resonance and cymatics — so I asked him to create this art and he recreated my idea exactly in the way I asked him to do it: with a pentagonal cymatic resonance below the symmetry of the DNA golden decagon molecule..with a Pentagram above formed by orbital resonance... 

As above, so below...

~ Gabriel Lyrio

node.text:
Robert Edward Grant (@robertedwardgrant) is sharing what makes beautiful mind: any moment free from fear is an opportunity to taste immortality and new possibilities.

With over 2.5 million views on YouTube.

In the spirit of ideas worth spreading, TEDx is a program of local, self-organized events that bring people together to share a TED-like experience. At a TEDx event, TEDTalks video and live speakers combine to spark deep discussion and connection in a small group.
ㅤ

node.text:
By @lanceschuttler A quote by architect, engineer, futurist and humanitarian, Jacque Fresco, who founded The Venus Project with Roxanne Meadows.

We now have within our grasp and our view, a world where all people are provided the basic necessities of life: living, structured & crystalline water, clean and uncontaminated food, shelter, clothing, true freedom, social support, interaction and love. 

Unfortunately though, the current political, financial and social systems we have in place hinder us from utilizing and implementing the full scope of our scientific and technological capabilities. In a positive and life-supporting way, we can use certain technologies to help liberate the world from the drudgery the current system keeps most people entrapped in.

This system is replaceable though. For the issue of political corruption, the blockchain solves. For financial corruption, the blockchain solves. Open source technologies and methods are the way forward. They are opening doors for us to create a world of abundance for all.

The blockchain and existing and emerging technologies will deliver the end-game blow to these old, outdated and corrupt systems of our world.

For our crypto movement to truly be successful, we must ensure these technologies converge to help all of life on this planet. Our crypto movement cannot be about “financial gains” for a few.

Our friend and peer, Vitalik Buterin, had this to say on the topic:

“ *All* crypto communities, ethereum included, should heed these words of warning. Need to differentiate between getting hundreds of billions of dollars of digital paper wealth sloshing around and actually achieving something meaningful for society.”

Or as the great humanitarian Buckminster Fuller stated:

“It is now highly feasible to take care of everybody on Earth at a higher standard of living than any have ever known. It no longer has to be you or me. Selfishness is unnecessary. War is obsolete. It is a mater of converting the high technology from weaponry to livingry.”

From the article "Crypto-Million & Billionaires: Let’s Build This Kind of World" by Lance Schuttler. 

Read the full article through his site in his bio.
